parameters.prompt:
=Create an engaging social media post for MoneyMap, a budgeting app for students and young adults (18-30).

Tone: Friendly, relatable, not salesy
Length: 200-280 characters for Twitter, longer for other platforms
Include: A hook, value prop, and subtle CTA
Topics: budgeting tips, subscription management, savings goals, financial clarity
Style: Use emojis, make it conversational

Current time: {{ $now.format('HH:mm') }}
Platform: {{ $json.platform }}

Generate a post that would resonate with our target audience.

nodes.name: AI Content Generator
nodes.notes: Generates unique content for each platform

nodes.name: Time Check
nodes.notes: Routes content based on time of day

nodes.name: Platform Router
nodes.notes: Determines which platforms to post to

parameters.name: query
parameters.value: mutation { createPost(input: { name: "MoneyMap", tagline: "Simple money clarity for students", description: "{{ $json.generatedContent }}" }) { post { id } } }

nodes.name: Weekly Check
nodes.notes: Only posts to PH on Mondays

nodes.name: Post to Reddit
nodes.notes: Posts valuable content to Reddit (careful with self-promo)

nodes.name: A/B Testing Engine
nodes.notes: Runs A/B tests on content variations
